level.heading: Timeliness and scope of application for military-overseas ballot.
level.text: An application for a military-overseas ballot is timely if received by the 7th day before the election. An application for a military-overseas ballot for a primary election, whether or not timely, is effective as an application for a military-overseas ballot for the general election.
